title: shrI rAma nAma
sahitya:
shrI rAma nAma bhajanai shei manamE shIr vaLarum ihapara sukham tarum


anupallavi

  nIrAr shaDaik-kayilai Ishan (gangai) mukti neri iduvenrannai kAdil Odiya


caraNam    kAmamAdi aru paghaiyum azhiyum kavalai nOigaL tAnE maraindozhiyum
rAmadAsan nAvilE koluvirukkum raghupatiyin vEdasAra tAraka
